channel.title: Getting Arrow on top of NPC's

item.title: Getting Arrow on top of NPC's
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

Okay so i added tut island and i need to add the arrow on top of the guides.
I found this void but I donâ€™t know if it is the right one.

public void spawnNpc(Client c, int npcType, int x, int y, int heightLevel, int WalkingType, int HP, int maxHit, int attack, int defence, boolean attackPlayer, boolean headIcon) { // first, search for a free slot int slot = -1; for (int i = 1; i < maxNPCs; i++) { if (npcs[i] == null) { slot = i; break; } } if(slot == -1) { return; } NPC newNPC = new NPC(slot, npcType); newNPC.absX = x; newNPC.absY = y; newNPC.makeX = x; newNPC.makeY = y; newNPC.heightLevel = heightLevel; newNPC.walkingType = WalkingType; newNPC.HP = HP; newNPC.MaxHP = HP; newNPC.maxHit = maxHit; newNPC.attack = attack; newNPC.defence = defence; newNPC.spawnedBy = c.getId(); if(headIcon) c.getPA().drawHeadicon(1, slot, 0, 0); for(int anim = 4277; anim < 4285; anim++) { if(npcType == anim) { newNPC.forceChat("I'M ALIVE!"); } } if(npcType == 945) { c.getPA().drawHeadicon(1, slot, 0, 0); } if(npcType == 3117) { newNPC.forceChat("Hello there "+c.playerName+"!"); newNPC.gfx0(580); } if(npcType == 2458) { newNPC.forceChat("Hello there "+c.playerName+", I need your help!"); newNPC.gfx0(580); } if(attackPlayer) { newNPC.underAttack = true; if(c != null) { newNPC.killerId = c.playerId; } } npcs[slot] = newNPC; }

As you can probably see I added

if(npcType == 945) { c.getPA().drawHeadicon(1, slot, 0, 0); }
But it is not working
Anyone got any ideas?
Thanks

Read full topic
